    *   [Треды с сообщениями из рассылки](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/threads/get-threads-by-statuses-and-logins#) 
    *   [Причины перехода агентов в неактивный статус](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/threads/get-threads-by-statuses-and-logins#)

    *   [Качество обслуживания](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/threads/get-threads-by-statuses-and-logins#) 
    *   [Очередь](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/threads/get-threads-by-statuses-and-logins#)

*   API edna Chat Center
*   Треды
*   Получить треды по статусам и логинам агентов

On this page

Получить треды по статусам и логинам агентов
============================================

`----    Permissions:INTEGRATOR,OPERATOR,SUPERVISOR    ----`

Параметры запроса| Параметр | Описание |
| --- | --- |
| `statuses` | Список статусов тредов |
| `agentLogins` | Список логинов операторов, на которых назначены треды |

Пример curl[​](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/threads/get-threads-by-statuses-and-logins#%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80-curl "Direct link to Пример curl")
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

`$ curl 'http://localhost:8080/api/v1/threads?statuses=ASSIGNED&statuses=CLOSED&agentsLogins=operator11&agentsLogins=operator15' -i -X GET \    -H 'Authorization: Bearer <integrator_token>' \    -H 'X-Tenant-Name: local'`

Пример HTTP запроса[​](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/threads/get-threads-by-statuses-and-logins#%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80-http-%D0%B7%D0%B0%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B0 "Direct link to Пример HTTP запроса")
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

`GET /api/v1/threads?statuses=ASSIGNED&statuses=CLOSED&agentsLogins=operator11&agentsLogins=operator15 HTTP/1.1Authorization: Bearer <integrator_token>X-Tenant-Name: localHost: localhost:8080`

Пример успешного HTTP ответа[​](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/threads/get-threads-by-statuses-and-logins#%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80-%D1%83%D1%81%D0%BF%D0%B5%D1%88%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE-http-%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B0 "Direct link to Пример успешного HTTP ответа")
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

`HTTP/1.1 200 OKX-Request-Id: 979ca28f-29da-4e3a-a86b-b43ecf2a96a9Vary: OriginVary: Access-Control-Request-MethodVary: Access-Control-Request-HeadersContent-Type: application/jsonX-Content-Type-Options: nosniffX-XSS-Protection: 0Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidatePragma: no-cacheExpires: 0X-Frame-Options: DENYContent-Length: 947[ {  "id" : 6,  "status" : "CLOSED",  "startTime" : "2024-12-28T11:39:38.145Z",  "stateChangeTime" : "2024-12-28T11:39:38.145Z",  "unread" : 2,  "unanswered" : 2,  "currentAgent" : 1,  "currentAgentLogin" : "login#1",  "lastAgent" : 14,  "lastAgentLogin" : "login#14",  "channel" : 26,  "clientId" : 2,  "clientExternalId" : "2",  "clientName" : "client#2",  "threadUrl" : "http://threads.im/arm/thread/152",  "tags" : [ ],  "info" : { , {  "id" : 7,  "status" : "ASSIGNED",  "startTime" : "2024-12-28T11:39:38.145Z",  "stateChangeTime" : "2024-12-28T11:39:38.145Z",  "unread" : 0,  "unanswered" : 0,  "currentAgent" : 1,  "currentAgentLogin" : "login#1",  "lastAgent" : 15,  "lastAgentLogin" : "login#15",  "channel" : 27,  "clientId" : 2,  "clientExternalId" : "2",  "clientName" : "client#2",  "threadUrl" : "http://threads.im/arm/thread/167",  "tags" : [ "2", "1" ],  "info" : {    "key" : "value"   ]`

[Previous Получить открытые треды](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/threads/get-open-threads)[Next Получить отфильтрованные треды](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/threads/get-filtered-threads)

*   [Пример curl](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/threads/get-threads-by-statuses-and-logins#%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80-curl)
*   [Пример HTTP запроса](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/threads/get-threads-by-statuses-and-logins#%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80-http-%D0%B7%D0%B0%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B0)
*   [Пример успешного HTTP ответа](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/threads/get-threads-by-statuses-and-logins#%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80-%D1%83%D1%81%D0%BF%D0%B5%D1%88%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE-http-%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B0)

[![Image 4](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/img/logo-footer.svg)](https://edna.ru/)

Copyright © 2025 edna

Feedback

    *   [Очередь](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/threads/get-threads-by-statuses-and-logins#) 
    *   [Отчеты](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/threads/get-threads-by-statuses-and-logins#) 
    *   [Супервайзеры](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/threads/get-threads-by-statuses-and-logins#) 
    *   [Треды](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/threads/get-threads-by-statuses-and-logins#) 
        *   [Настройки](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/threads/thread-settings)

        *   [Получить треды по статусам и логинам агентов](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/threads/get-threads-by-statuses-and-logins)

        *   [Назначить тред агенту](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/threads/assign-thread)
        *   [Перевести тред](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/threads/transfer-thread)
        *   [Переключить тред](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/threads/resolve-thread)
        *   [Закрыть тред](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/threads/close-thread)
        *   [Принудительно закрыть тред](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/threads/close-thread-with-comment)
        *   [Получить среднее время обработки тредов за определенный период](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/threads/aht-thread)

*   API edna Chat Center
*   Треды
*   Получить треды по статусам и логинам агентов

On this page

Получить треды по статусам и логинам агентов
============================================

`----    Permissions:INTEGRATOR,OPERATOR,SUPERVISOR    ----`

Параметры запроса| Параметр | Описание |
| --- | --- |
| `statuses` | Список статусов тредов |
| `agentLogins` | Список логинов операторов, на которых назначены треды |

Пример curl[​](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/threads/get-threads-by-statuses-and-logins#%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80-curl "Direct link to Пример curl")
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

`$ curl 'http://localhost:8080/api/v1/threads?statuses=ASSIGNED&statuses=CLOSED&agentsLogins=operator11&agentsLogins=operator15' -i -X GET \    -H 'Authorization: Bearer <integrator_token>' \    -H 'X-Tenant-Name: local'`

Пример HTTP запроса[​](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/threads/get-threads-by-statuses-and-logins#%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80-http-%D0%B7%D0%B0%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B0 "Direct link to Пример HTTP запроса")
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

`GET /api/v1/threads?statuses=ASSIGNED&statuses=CLOSED&agentsLogins=operator11&agentsLogins=operator15 HTTP/1.1Authorization: Bearer <integrator_token>X-Tenant-Name: localHost: localhost:8080`

Пример успешного HTTP ответа[​](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/threads/get-threads-by-statuses-and-logins#%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80-%D1%83%D1%81%D0%BF%D0%B5%D1%88%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE-http-%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B0 "Direct link to Пример успешного HTTP ответа")
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

`HTTP/1.1 200 OKX-Request-Id: 979ca28f-29da-4e3a-a86b-b43ecf2a96a9Vary: OriginVary: Access-Control-Request-MethodVary: Access-Control-Request-HeadersContent-Type: application/jsonX-Content-Type-Options: nosniffX-XSS-Protection: 0Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidatePragma: no-cacheExpires: 0X-Frame-Options: DENYContent-Length: 947[ {  "id" : 6,  "status" : "CLOSED",  "startTime" : "2024-12-28T11:39:38.145Z",  "stateChangeTime" : "2024-12-28T11:39:38.145Z",  "unread" : 2,  "unanswered" : 2,  "currentAgent" : 1,  "currentAgentLogin" : "login#1",  "lastAgent" : 14,  "lastAgentLogin" : "login#14",  "channel" : 26,  "clientId" : 2,  "clientExternalId" : "2",  "clientName" : "client#2",  "threadUrl" : "http://threads.im/arm/thread/152",  "tags" : [ ],  "info" : { , {  "id" : 7,  "status" : "ASSIGNED",  "startTime" : "2024-12-28T11:39:38.145Z",  "stateChangeTime" : "2024-12-28T11:39:38.145Z",  "unread" : 0,  "unanswered" : 0,  "currentAgent" : 1,  "currentAgentLogin" : "login#1",  "lastAgent" : 15,  "lastAgentLogin" : "login#15",  "channel" : 27,  "clientId" : 2,  "clientExternalId" : "2",  "clientName" : "client#2",  "threadUrl" : "http://threads.im/arm/thread/167",  "tags" : [ "2", "1" ],  "info" : {    "key" : "value"   ]`

[Previous Получить открытые треды](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/threads/get-open-threads)[Next Получить отфильтрованные треды](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/threads/get-filtered-threads)

*   [Пример curl](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/threads/get-threads-by-statuses-and-logins#%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80-curl)
*   [Пример HTTP запроса](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/threads/get-threads-by-statuses-and-logins#%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80-http-%D0%B7%D0%B0%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B0)
*   [Пример успешного HTTP ответа](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/threads/get-threads-by-statuses-and-logins#%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80-%D1%83%D1%81%D0%BF%D0%B5%D1%88%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE-http-%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B0)
